descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Welcome to CAGE RAGE, the ultimate Mixed Reality boxing royal rumble cage fight game! Get ready to enter the cage and experience the thrill of a lifetime with this heart-pumping, action-packed game.

With CAGE RAGE, you can choose to play with either controllers or bare hands, making it a truly immersive experience. The game doesn't require any buttons to be pressed, so you can hold your controllers with closed fists, just like a real fighter. This way, you'll feel like you're actually in the ring, throwing punches and dodging blows.

With Mixed Reality, you can see your surroundings and navigate the cage, you have the freedom to physically run, jump, dodge, or throw superman punchs. The cage boundaries can be set according to the physical space you have, whether it's a tiny room or an entire basketball court. So, you can play in your living room or even outside in your backyard!

Get ready to experience the excitement of a royal rumble cage fight like never before in CAGE RAGE. So grab your controller or your bare hands, step into the cage, and get ready for a wild and intense battle in CAGE RAGE!
